article: the fixed penalty -lrb- smoking offenses -rrb- bill #### was gazetted in hong kong on wednesday , which seeks to deal more effectively with the offense of smoking or carrying a lit cigarette , cigar or pipe in a statutory no smoking area or a transport carrier .
